name: hydration

effect.x_y: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This Pokémon is cured of any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

short_effect: Cures any major status ailment after each turn during rain.

flavor_text.x_y: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.
